channel.title: 317 summoning
channel.description: well i tried to follow this tutorial - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,441842.0.html when i try to pickup 1 of the pouches my client freezes and i get this is run.bat Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 30591 at Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.method462(Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.java:129) at Class8.method201(Class8.java:9453) at Class8.method200(Class8.java:9290) at client.method105(client.java:9202) at client.method36(client.java:1740) at client.method102(client.java:8757) at client.method9(client.java:9962) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:121) at client.run(client.java:5016) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

item.title: 317 summoning
item.dc:creator: @rain1994 rain1994
item.description:
@rain1994 wrote:

[quote=“failz, post:4, topic:347619”][quote author=rain1994 link=topic=444000.msg3260540#msg3260540 date=1278458254]
my opinion is that if u truly want to add all this stuff that wasnt in the 317 then just move on to a 474+ although i don’t think the 474 had summoning (not sure).i recommend that u just don’t do summoning in your 317 or get a different source altogether maybe like a 508?
[/quote]

rain is aboustly right most people join a 317 because they what 317 if they wanted summoning and stuff like that move to a 474+

anyways ill tell you how to fix that problem
it is cuased from many things one is
the item id is to high another one is that your model numbers are to high and the last one is that your ints are wrong[/quote]

Just gonna say thank you failz

Read full topic

item.title: 317 summoning
item.dc:creator: @failz failz
item.description:
@failz wrote:

rain1994:

my opinion is that if u truly want to add all this stuff that wasnt in the 317 then just move on to a 474+ although i don’t think the 474 had summoning (not sure).i recommend that u just don’t do summoning in your 317 or get a different source altogether maybe like a 508?

rain is aboustly right most people join a 317 because they what 317 if they wanted summoning and stuff like that move to a 474+

anyways ill tell you how to fix that problem
it is cuased from many things one is
the item id is to high another one is that your model numbers are to high and the last one is that your ints are wrong
